label.text: Choose the Rendering Method for the Character.
Sparrow Characters use one Spritesheet image and an .xml file including the Frame Data.
Packer Characters use one Spritesheet image and a .txt file including the Frame Data.
Atlas Characters use one image containing the Spritemap, one .json file containing the Spritemap Data and another .json file for the Animation Data.
Multi-Sparrow Characters are similar to Sparrow Characters, except their animations could be found in separate Sparrow Rendering files.
